ðŸ“– Summary: Vectras VM is an Android application that emulates various operating systems using QEMU. It allows users to run operating systems like Windows, Linux, macOS, and Android on their Android devices. The application supports devices with Android 6.0 and up, with recommended specifications including Android 8.1, 8GB RAM, and a Snapdragon 855 CPU or better.
